info.title: API Documentation - Fulfillment API
info.description: The Fulfillment API handles the fulfillment of patient orders.

get.description: Gets a list of orders with their current status

x-unitTests.x-testDescription: Gets a list of orders with their current status

post.description:
Creates an order for content and requests an email be sent to the consumer with a link to the content.


## Data Parameters
| Parameter  | Type  | Description  | Allowed Values |
|---|---|---|---|
|consumer|object:Consumer|The consumer for which this order is being created||
|actions|array:object:Action|The delivery action(s) to take upon successful processing||
|deliverOn|datetime|[optional] date on which to process order.  If omitted, order will be be processed immediately||
|message|object:Message|Message and item meta data ||
|context|dictionary:object|[Optional] ||
|tags|dictionary:object|[Optional] Meta-data items not used in processing that will be stored with the order ||
|assessment|object:Assessment|[Optional] ||
|survey|object:Survey|[Optional][Deprecated] left for backwards compatibility, surveys no longer supported ||
|deliverOn|datetime|[Optional] date on which to process the order||

data.subject: This message was sent by Fulfillment Api
data.body:
Hello {{consumer.name.given}} {{consumer.name.family}},

Here is your information

Go here to opt out of future messages

error.message: The consumer identified does not exist. Please create a consumer prior to creating an order.

request.body:
{"consumer":{"href":"{{consumer.api}}/v1/consumers/{{consumer.id}}"},"actions":[{"action":"send.email","data":{"from":"Fulfillment Service ","subject":"This message was sent by Fulfillment Api","body":"
{{headinggroup}}

{{headingParagraph}}

Hello {{consumer.name.given}} {{consumer.name.family}},

Here is your information

Go here to opt out of future messages

","headingGroup":"TEST HEADING Outpatient Care Clinic","headingParagraph":"...Clever catchphrase"}}],"deliverOn":"7/5/2017 8:59:01 PM","message":{"note":"Good talking to you today {{consumer.name.given}}.","items":[{"href":"{{content.api}}/v1/content/abq6317/en-us/"}]}}

expectedResponse.body:
{"status":201,"versioning":{"X-HW-Version":"1"},"links":{"self":"https://fulfillment.test.hwapps.net/orders/8fc27f63-9dc6-4751-b7d0-b6b20a5e7885"},"schema":"https://fulfillment.test.hwapps.net/spec/schema.healthwise.api.item.json","data":{"actions":[{"action":"send.email","data":{"from":"Fulfillment Service ","subject":"This message was sent by Fulfillment Api","body":"

Hello {{consumer.name.given}} {{consumer.name.family}},

Here is your information

Go here to opt out of future messages

"}}],"message":{"note":"Good talking to you today {{consumer.name.given}}.","items":[{"href":"https://content.test.hwapps.net/v1/content/abq6317/en-us/","presurveyhref":"https://content.test.hwapps.net/v1/content/somepresurvey/en-us","postsurveyhref":"https://content.test.hwapps.net/v1/content/somepostsurvey/en-us"}]},"id":"8fc27f63-9dc6-4751-b7d0-b6b20a5e7885","orderState":{"status":"Delayed"},"deliverOn":"2017-07-05T20:59:01"}}

x-unitTests.x-testDescription:
Creates an order for content and requests an email be sent to the consumer with a link to the content.


## Data Parameters
| Parameter  | Type  | Description  | Allowed Values |
|---|---|---|---|
|consumer|object:Consumer|The consumer for which this order is being created||
|actions|array:object:Action|The delivery action(s) to take upon successful processing||
|deliverOn|datetime|[optional] date on which to process order.  If omitted, order will be be processed immediately||
|message|object:Message|Message and item meta data ||
|context|dictionary:object|[Optional] ||
|tags|dictionary:object|[Optional] Meta-data items not used in processing that will be stored with the order ||
|assessment|object:Assessment|[Optional] ||
|survey|object:Survey|[Optional][Deprecated] left for backwards compatibility, surveys no longer supported ||
|deliverOn|datetime|[Optional] date on which to process the order||

get.description: Retrieves a single order from the system

post.description:
For for each consumer in the list, creates an order content and requests an optional email be sent to the consumer with a link to the content


## Data Parameters
| Parameter  | Type  | Description  | Allowed Values |
|---|---|---|---|
|consumer|object:Consumer|The consumer for which this order is being created||
|actions|array:object:Action|The delivery action(s) to take upon successful processing||
|message|object:Message|Message and item meta data ||

request.body:
{"consumers":[{"href":"{{consumer.api}}/v1/consumers/{{consumer.id}}"},{"href":"{{consumer.api}}/v1/consumers/{{consumer.id.2}}"}],"actions":[{"action":"send.email","data":{"from":"Fulfillment Service ","subject":"This message was sent by Fulfillment Api","body":"

Hello {{consumer.name.given}} {{consumer.name.family}},

Here is your information

Go here to opt out of future messages

"}}],"message":{"note":"Good talking to you today {{consumer.name.given}}.","items":[{"href":"{{content.api}}/v1/content/aa113121/en-us/"}]}}
